name: Peppa Pig Gets Grounded China
description:
Controls: Left and Right keys to move, Up key to jump and spacebar to shoot! (Down Key to duck hard objects!)

Stuck? Well guess what you are in the best of luck today because this game has a shop that sells items that can be pretty useful in some parts choose to either be a good guy and buy it or be a bad guy and take it!

Story: Daddy Pig and his stupid kids went on a trip to china to chill but Peppa was going to miss the fun due to her behaviour he must stay in the china house so then she sneak out of there and do a rampage there what will daddy pig think?
